Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Link, have ya been over to Bedrock
Bistro yet?

<sp:3:0:2:0301>The <clr:0000>rock-roast pond <clr:ffff>is a good marker to
look for its location.

I guess Cooke has been having it out with
a customer...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Cooke's pretty stubborn, so things
will probably stay heated unless
someone intervenes.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Cooke's roasts are so good, but I don't wanna get
mixed up in that mess... What to do...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It doesn't matter how busy I am if you're
in a pinch, Link.

You come hollerin', and I'll help out!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Thinking about ruins that originate in the
age of legends...

Maybe <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff> southeast
from here?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>If there's tons of Zonai device stuff falling
from the sky, a clue about the <clr:0000>fifth sage<clr:ffff>
might be there too.
I'll search around here to sniff out
<clr:0000>anything strange <clr:ffff>that might be happening.

That leaves the other areas to you, Link!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll investigate around here to see if
<clr:0000>anything weird<clr:ffff> is happening.

So don't you worry! You should focus
your energy elsewhere, Link!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Everything's OK around here lately.


If you're lookin' to help folks out, you
might check elsewhere.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>For now, I'll keep an eye out to see
whether anything strange is going on
around here.
Link, you take care of what you need
to, OK?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The blacksmith Rohan and his apprentice,
Fugo, have been arguing a lot.

Sounded like it had to do with the
Boulder Breaker.

Fugo had stopped working because of the
marbled rock roast.

I can't help but feel responsible...
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you find out anything about
the fifth sage?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>A Zonai?<sp:5:0:0> A Zonai<sp:5:1:0> spirit?!


Sorry 'bout that...


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>I'm just kinda shocked—I never could've
imagined something like that.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>But now we've got all five sages! Which
means...it's almost time to defeat the
Demon King.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But...I bet you he's on the same page as
we are.

Who knows what he's planning—what sort
of attack he'll launch on us...or when.

<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination>I'll beef up the city's patrols even more,
in preparation, goro!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Someone told me that Volcon and Tray
retired from the inn.

Said they had somewhere they needed
to go.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But they don't even know how to find it.
So...they need something to jog their
memory as to the location.
Kinda weird, huh?
Talk_28: <sp:3:0:2:0d01>Don't let your guard down either, Link!
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination>I bet the Demon King has realized that we
have all five sages now...

<sp:3:0:2:0601>Which means he's probably planning some
sort of attack.

Knowing that, I can't leave the city yet.


I've got to hunker down and keep an eye
on all the goings-on around here.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The ore YunoboCo provides is high
quality, and we offer it at a low price.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But mining came to a dead halt due to
the marbled rock roast, and we still
haven't caught up on the supply needs.
I feel bad for <clr:0000>Ramella<clr:ffff>, that <clr:0000>Gerudo<clr:ffff> who
always treks out here for good ore.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>There's an old mine we turned into an
amusement park recently!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But we haven't gotten word out much yet,
so it's not seeing much action.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>It's <clr:0000>across from<clr:ffff> the YunoboCo market
<clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of Goron City.

The location's not bad at all, but even so,
business is slow...
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination>The day of the final battle with the Demon
King is almost here.

When that time comes, we'll face him
together, goro!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>We made an amusement park that uses
the old <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> mine-cart tracks!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But we haven't been able to spread the
word yet, so it's not seein' much action
just yet.
I mean, the location is pretty good, but
the business is struggling...
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, Link! How are the preparations for
defeating the Demon King coming?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I heard some chatter recently about a
worker named <clr:0000>Mota <clr:ffff>who up and vanished.

Mota would've been working in a cave on
the side of <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's a <clr:0000>mine-cart station <clr:ffff>there, so I'm
gonna take a look out that way later and
see what I see.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The day of the final battle with the Demon
King is approaching. Time to tie up any
loose ends.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hey, Link...


I've been crackin' my skull trying to
remember anything that might help clue
us in on Princess Zelda.
But so much of my memory is a blur from
when I was wearing that weird mask...
I did recall one thing though.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>When we were mining marbled rock roast
<clr:0000>on the north side of Death Mountain<clr:ffff>, the
princess said something.
She told me not to go near the <clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes<clr:ffff>. But she didn't say why.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's why I was talking to Boss about it.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's a little Goron wanderin' around
the area lately.

He's searching for a place called
<clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>, where Gorons of old
supposedly lived.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>He's really young and probably doesn't
know how to operate the <clr:0000>mine carts<clr:ffff>...

I'm a bit worried he might hurt himself
tryin' though.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's a little Goron wanderin' around
the area lately.

He's searching for a place called
<clr:0000>Gorondia<clr:ffff>, where Gorons of old
supposedly lived.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>He's really young and probably doesn't
know how to operate the <clr:0000>mine carts<clr:ffff>...

I'm a bit worried he might hurt himself
wandering around alone, trying to find
this place.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I remembered something about that
other <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff>.

When we were mining marbled rock roast
<clr:0000>on the north side of Death Mountain<clr:ffff>,
she said something kinda funny.
She told me not to go near the <clr:0000>Lizard
Lakes<clr:ffff>. But she didn't say why.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's a Hylian named <clr:0000>Kima<clr:ffff> who's in
search of some hot springs.

I guess they're called...Simmerstone
Springs?

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Grapp <clr:ffff>at the <clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs <clr:ffff>might
be able to tell ya more about them.

This is the first I've heard of 'em myself.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll leave the fifth sage, Mineru, to
you, Link.

For now I'll keep patrolling the city and
preparing for the final battle!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Link,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>do you know about <clr:0000>perfectly
ripened flint<clr:ffff>?

It can be a real challenge to find, but it's
sooo tasty!

There's a guy at Cooke's <clr:0000>restaurant<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
Bedrock Bistro, you could check with.

He's a <clr:0000>goromand <clr:ffff>who can probably talk
your ear off about it.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>If I could try it, even once, I'd die a
happy Goron.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Have you sorted anything out about the
fifth sage?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Purah said to investigate any ruins from
the <clr:0000>age of legends<clr:ffff>, right?

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh yeah! <sp:5:1:0>There's a village in the
neighboring <clr:0000>Akkala <clr:ffff>region called
<clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> that seems worth checking.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>I hear that tons of these things called
Zonai devices are falling from the
sky there!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>And it's only a little bit <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> of here!
I bet it'd be worth the trip...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, I'll search around here to see
whether <clr:0000>anything strange <clr:ffff>warrants
looking into.
You're free to head wherever you need
to, Link!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder why that other <clr:0000>Zelda <clr:ffff>told me not
to go near the <clr:0000>Lizard Lakes<clr:ffff>.

I recall that some of the older Gorons
used to play there back<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>when they
were children...
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This might not have anything to do with
Princess Zelda, but...
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've heard that <clr:0000>Cooke<clr:ffff>, the owner of
Bedrock Bistro, is in a tough spot.

He can't keep up with the constant
demand for <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How's the search for Zelda goin'?


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've been tryin' to remember anything that
might help us.

But everything's hazy from when I was
wearin' that mask...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>So I've given up on trying to recall what
happened then.

Instead, I'm focusing on investigating
around here to see if <clr:0000>anything weird<clr:ffff>
is happening.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's a buncha monsters gathering
around a cave to the north of
Death Mountain.
Right now everyone from the
<clr:0000>monster-control crew <clr:ffff>is there.

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>monster-control crew <clr:ffff>are really
skilled and deal with this sort of thing
a lot.
Even so, the monsters around here are
intense... I'm kinda worried.
